courseDetails.title: Transforme ton Intérieur en Environnement de Réussite
courseDetails.shortDescription: Transforme ton espace de vie en moteur de clarté, de discipline et de réussite grâce à ce système minimaliste
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ce cours t'accompagne pas à pas pour transformer ton environnement personnel en véritable moteur de réussite. Trop souvent, notre intérieur reflète un état de confusion, de surcharge ou d'incohérence — et cela se répercute directement sur notre clarté mentale, notre énergie, et notre capacité à avancer dans nos projets.

Tu vas découvrir ici une méthode en 5 étapes pour concevoir un espace de vie minimaliste, structuré, et profondément aligné avec la personne que tu veux devenir.
On ne parle pas de décoration tendance, mais bien de stratégie environnementale. L’objectif : créer un espace qui t’aide à te concentrer, te motiver et rester cohérent(e) avec tes priorités.

Dans ce cours, tu apprendras à :

  • faire le tri de manière ciblée grâce à la routine du “débroussaillage”,

  • repenser tes espaces selon leurs fonctions clés,

  • intégrer des éléments propulseurs (lumière, sons, objets utiles),

  • mettre en place des routines simples, mais puissantes, en lien avec ton espace.

Tu auras aussi accès aux ressources et outils que j'utilise  : simulateur d’aube, ambiances sonores, outils numériques (Things 3, Forest), et même des interviews inspirantes.

Ce cours est fait pour toi si tu veux créer un intérieur qui te soutient au lieu de te disperser. Aucun prérequis. Juste une envie de changement durable.
targetAudiences: Les personnes qui veulent créer un environnement de vie aligné avec leurs objectifs personnels ou professionnels.
Celles et ceux qui ressentent un besoin de clarté mentale, de structure et de légèreté dans leur quotidien.
Les autodidactes, freelances, créateurs, étudiants ou entrepreneurs souhaitant un espace qui les soutient au lieu de les freiner.
Toute personne attirée par le minimalisme, les routines efficaces, ou la volonté de transformer son intérieur en levier d’action concret.

courseDetails.title: Liberté et efficacité : vivre du minimalisme en voyageant
courseDetails.shortDescription: L’art du voyage minimaliste : libère-toi pour explorer le monde !
courseDetails.longDescription:
Et si tu pouvais voyager plus souvent, travailler depuis n’importe où et vivre avec plus de légèreté ? Ce cours te guide pas à pas pour adopter un mode de vie minimaliste qui te permet de te concentrer sur l’essentiel : la liberté, la créativité et l’équilibre.


Tu apprendras à réduire le superflu, à organiser ton espace de travail mobile et à créer un rythme de vie fluide, que tu sois à la maison, en déplacement ou à l’étranger. L’objectif est simple : te libérer du poids des possessions, du stress logistique et des routines rigides pour redécouvrir le plaisir de voyager et de travailler avec clarté.


Ce cours t’aidera à :

  • Voyager plus léger, plus libre et plus souvent.

  • Travailler efficacement, peu importe où tu te trouves.

  • Simplifier ton quotidien pour retrouver motivation et énergie.

  • Adopter un état d’esprit minimaliste qui favorise la sérénité et la productivité.


À travers une méthode claire et accessible, tu découvriras comment repenser ton mode de vie, planifier tes déplacements intelligemment et créer une activité professionnelle alignée avec tes valeurs.


À la fin du cours, tu auras une vision concrète et réaliste du business voyage minimaliste et les outils nécessaires pour vivre autrement, avec moins d’encombrement et plus de liberté.


Commence dès aujourd’hui à construire un mode de vie simple, équilibré et tourné vers l’essentiel.
targetAudiences: Tu veux voyager léger tout en travaillant efficacement depuis n’importe où.
Tu rêves d’une vie nomade, mais tu ne sais pas comment t’organiser pour que ce soit durable et agréable.
Tu ressens le besoin de simplifier ta vie, de te libérer du superflu et de te concentrer sur l’essentiel.
Tu cherches à concilier liberté, productivité et équilibre personnel.
Tu es freelance, entrepreneur, créateur ou salarié à distance, et tu veux que chaque voyage soit une source d’énergie plutôt qu’un fardeau.

courseDetails.title: CSS, Bootstrap ,JavaScript, PHP Full Stack Crash Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Full Stack Course CSS, Bootstrap ,JavaScript, PHP All  in one Crash Course For Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn CSS and Bootstrap and Javascript and PHP  all in one crash course

section 1- CSS course with basics and advanced concepts of CSS

  • ever wonder how the latest website designs are made? Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) are the main coding files used to lay out a website and its design. CSS 3 is the latest in styling standards, and it brings several new properties and declarations you can use to make your website design more easily created. CSS is currently the only standard in website design that plugs directly into your HTML, even the latest HTML 5 standards. With CSS 3 and HTML 5, you can create the latest interactive pages for your website viewers.

  • this course shows you how to create CSS classes from a beginner's level. It starts off with basic HTML declarations, properties, values, and how to include a CSS style sheet with your HTML code. For those of you who are new to CSS and HTML, we show you step-by-step how to create a CSS file and include it in your HTML code, even if you use a cloud server for your hosting.

  • we show you how to position your elements, layout your elements relative to your documents, and style your HTML using predefined CSS values. We introduce you to the common CSS styling that you'll need when you start off designing your pages. If you want to get to know CSS and website design, this course is meant for you, and it can be used by anyone who hasn't even seen one line of CSS code yet. We focus on the latest CSS 3 and HTML 5 standards, so you get the latest when coding your website pages instead of focusing on older code.

  • there are no prerequisites. Anyone Can join this course. It is recommended though that individual have some basic computer programming knowledge.


  • Course Topics


  • Introduction to CSS

  • inclusion Of CSS In HTML

  • CSS syntax

  • CSS styling Text

  • CSS page backgrounds

  • CSS 2D transform


  • and more....



  • Section 2- Learn bootstrap in a crash course


  • bootstrap grid system

  • bootstrap alerts

  • bootstrap badges

  • bootstrap forms

  • bootstrap breadcrumb

  • bootstrap  labels

  • and more...


  • Section 3- learn javascript programming language

    • The course is created with thorough, extensive, but easy-to-follow content that you’ll easily understand and absorb.

      The course starts with the basics, including JavaScript fundamentals, programming, and user interaction.


      the curriculum is going to be very hands-on as we walk you from start to finish to become a professional Javascript developer. We will start from the very beginning by teaching you Javascript basics and programming fundamentals, and then execute into real-life practice and be ready for the real world.


    • while Javascript is complicated for beginners to learn, it is widely used in many web development areas.

    • this course gets you started with an introduction to JavaScript. It assumes that you're new to the language, so it gets you started with basic functionality such as creating functions, creating variables, and calling these lines of code from your standard HTML pages. It talks about events and triggers for custom event handling. It talks about pattern matching, searching for text within a page, flow control, and the document object model (DOM). We start off with the basics and move on to more complex functionality such as arrays and objects. We then discuss how to script common elements with JavaScript such as forms and tables. At the very end, we discuss major libraries such as Ajax, which allows you to make asynchronous calls to server-side scripts without reloading the web page in the server.

    • Discover how to work with lists and sequence data

You'll be introduced to the request/response cycle, including GET/POST/Redirect. You'll also gain an introductory understanding of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML), as well as the basic syntax and data structures of the PHP language, variables, logic, iteration, arrays, error handling, and superglobal variables, among other elements.

courseDetails.title: Flawless Writing: English Punctuation for Business Writers

If you are focusing on academic writing or business writing, having proper knowledge of English punctuation and English grammar is a must. Initially, we'll introduce you to all the punctuation you need to know while writing English.

Terminal points in English sentences signify the end point of independent clauses. You may express the depth of a statement with breaks or pauses and highlight any significant points with brackets. With our course, you'll learn how and when to use punctuation correctly to express thoughts in sentences.

Additionally, you will learn how to use apostrophes, dashes, slashes, and connectors to separate and join different letters, phrases, and clauses. You will also learn when to use quotes.

As you go along, you'll study about punctuation in academic writing, creative writing, journalism, and technical writing. This is because different genres require distinct writing styles.

We are not done yet; by following our course guidelines, you will learn to effectively use punctuation in memos and business communications and write with good English grammar and punctuation.

So let's not pass up the opportunity to master the use of English punctuation with our special English Punctuation Simplified course. Enroll Right Away!


This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Introduction to English Punctuation: We will cover English punctuation in detail in this part, including its types, history, significance, usage, mistakes, and pauses. It makes a sentence's meaning more evident.

  2. Terminal Points: Terminal points in English sentences signify the end of independent clauses. In this section, we explain how terminal points, such as question marks, exclamation points, and full stops, clarify a sentence's meaning.

  3. Punctuation for Breaks or Pauses: This section will go over the usage of English punctuation, such as colons, semicolons, and commas, as pauses or breaks in sentences. Consequently, you will learn how to punctuate breaks.

  4. Information on Parenthesis and Brackets: This section will go over the many kinds of brackets, such as square or round brackets, and why they are necessary in English writing. You will have a firm grasp of the functions of brackets by this section.

  5. Connectors and Dividers: This section will explain the functions of hyphens, dashes, slashes, and apostrophes as connectors or dividers between various letters, words, phrases, or clauses in all types of writing.

  6. Quotes Material: Quote materials are used to write quotes or any notes in academic writing and business writing. You will learn specifically how to use quotation marks, ellipses, and their spheres of application in this section of our English Punctuation Simplified course.

  7. Other Signs and Symbols: In addition to English punctuation, other signals are used as well. They are crucial for delivering information and other curriculum. The purposes of various signs and symbols will be covered in this section.

  8. A Review on Abbreviations: You will understand every aspect of the abbreviations here. To provide you with a thorough understanding, this section will go over these abbreviations in detail.

  9. Punctuation in Different Types of Writing: This section aims to familiarize you with the many forms of English Writingand how punctuation can be applied to each. Besides tips and advice, you will learn how punctuation plays a significant role in communicating clarity and accuracy in technical and academic writing.

  10. Punctuation in Professional Communication: This section will teach you how important punctuation is in business writing. This lesson will give you the skills and information to make your business emails, memoranda, and report writing more effective and efficient.

  11. The Uses of Capitalisation: This section of the English Punctuation Simplified course will teach you the importance of capitalization in English Writing. You will learn how to use capitalization effectively to communicate your ideas clearly and accurately by the end of this course.

  12. Common Errors While Using Specific Punctuation: This section helps learners avoid clear punctuation errors. By the end of this course, you will be able to recognize and fix mistakes, such as poorly used commas, apostrophes, and semicolons, as well as properly used quote symbols.

Product Owner Certification: Mastering the Art of Value Delivery in Scrum

Welcome to the Product Owner Certification, meticulously designed to elevate your understanding and application of the Scrum framework, specifically through the lens of a Product Owner. This assessment-driven course is tailored to affirm your expertise in Scrum practices and the nuances of the Product Owner role, as detailed in the Official Scrum Guide.




For Professionals: Enhance Your Agile Career

As a Product Owner or an individual aspiring to embrace this crucial role within Agile teams, this certification will benchmark your proficiency, enabling you to:

  • Showcase Your Expertise: Demonstrate your comprehensive grasp of the Scrum framework, making you a valuable asset in the Agile job market.

For Organizations: Optimize Your Scrum Teams

In today's dynamic landscape of technology and product development, Agile methodologies are the bedrock of successful and timely product delivery. Adopting Scrum can fundamentally transform Agile product management, fostering enhanced collaboration and superior product outcomes. By engaging in our Product Owner Certification Assessment, your organization can reap numerous benefits:

  • Assess Team Skills: Confirm that your Product Owners and team members have a robust understanding of Scrum practices and values.

  • Competitive Advantage: Distinguish your company in the realm of Agile product management by showcasing certified Product Owners, appealing to clients and projects that value certified expertise.


The Role of a Product Owner: Champion of Value Maximization

The Product Owner is a key player within Scrum teams, acting as the nexus between the customer, the development team, and the product itself. As a Product Owner, you are charged with:

  • Prioritizing Value Delivery Guide your team in delivering the highest value to customers by effectively managing and ordering the Product Backlog.

  • Facilitating Scrum Artifacts Collaborate with the Scrum Master and development team to ensure that Product Backlog items are well-understood, transparent, and actionable.

  • Navigating Complexity Tackle complex product challenges by fostering an environment that encourages innovation, rapid feedback, and iterative progress.

  • Mentoring and Leadership Empower your team to embrace Agile practices, promoting self-organization, and continuous growth in value delivery.


Why Choose Our Product Owner Certification Assessment?

Our assessment is thoughtfully crafted to reflect the comprehensive scope of the Scrum framework as per the Official Scrum Guide. What makes our Product Owner Certification Assessment stand out:

  • Real-World Application Our questions challenge you with scenarios that Product Owners frequently encounter, ensuring a practical understanding of the role.

  • Extensive Scope The assessment encompasses all critical aspects of the Product Owner role, from backlog management to stakeholder engagement, offering a thorough evaluation of your knowledge.

  • Immediate Insights Receive instant feedback on your performance, helping you to identify areas for further study or confirming your expertise.

  • Product Owner Certificate Successful candidates will receive a Product Owner Certificate issued by Agile Enterprise Coach, adding a tangible credential to your professional achievements.

Assessment Structure and Content

The Product Owner Certification Assessment consists of multiple-choice questions that span a wide array of topics, including but not limited to:

  • Scrum Theory and Empiricism

  • Product Owner Responsibilities and Accountabilities

  • Effective Product Backlog Management

  • Maximizing Value and ROI

  • Stakeholder Engagement and Communication

  • Understanding and Applying the Definition of Done


How to Get Certified

  1. Prepare Thoroughly: Study the Official Scrum Guide and familiarize yourself with the role of the Product Owner.

  2. Complete the Assessment: Answer the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  3. Submit Your Results: Send proof of your completed assessment to receive your Product Owner Certificate from our institution.

  4. Enhance Your Credentials: Display your certification on your CV and professional profiles to showcase your expertise.

Course Outline:

Module 1: Introduction to Power BI Report Design

  • Best practices and common pitfalls.

  • How to create reports that inform and impress simultaneously?

Module 2: Overview of the Report

Module 4: Understanding Fields of Visuals and Creating Donut & Column Charts

  • Understanding the fields and data aggregation in Power BI visuals.

  • Practical tips for customizing visuals to highlight key data points.

  • Exploring the formatting pane to enhance visual appeal.

Module 5: Selection Pane, Bookmarks, and Buttons

  • Using the selection pane to manage visual layers.

  • Creating bookmarks to save specific report states.

  • Adding buttons for interactive navigation.

Module 6: Switching Visuals through Buttons

  • Managing visual visibility and state changes with bookmarks.

  • Practical demonstration of creating a dynamic report interface.

  • Tips for maintaining a smooth user experience.

  • Techniques for layering and grouping report elements.

  • Best practices for creating a visually appealing report layout.

  • Using KPI cards to emphasize important metrics.

  • Practical examples of organizing report visuals.

Module 8: Chiclet Slicer and Dynamic Titles

  • Setting up and customizing the chiclet slicer.

  • Creating a dynamic title that updates with slicer selections.

  • Practical examples of using images in slicers.

  • Tips for enhancing user interaction with dynamic elements.

Module 9: Adding Logos, Slicers, and Finalizing Visuals

  • Adding and positioning logos in your reports.

  • Setting up slicers to filter data effectively.

  • Finalizing the visual design of your reports.

  • Practical tips for aligning report elements with your brand.

  • Using themes to create a consistent visual style.

Module 11: Dynamic Calculations

courseDetails.title: Hormonal Health Mastery: Stress, Sex, Diet & Steroid Effects
courseDetails.shortDescription: Hormone Health Demystified: From Stress Hormones to Nutrition, Fitness,  Sex Hormones and Natural Balance Techniques
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master your body’s natural rhythm with our expert-led Hormone Health course. From sex and stress hormones to diet and lifestyle tweaks, learn how to achieve hormonal balance, improve fitness, and feel your best—naturally.

Your hormones are the silent drivers of your physical and emotional health. When balanced, they help you maintain energy, manage weight, think clearly, and feel emotionally stable. But when they’re out of sync, they can impact everything—from sleep and digestion to mood and metabolism.

This comprehensive course is your step-by-step guide to understanding hormone health and building a hormone-balanced lifestyle. You’ll explore how the endocrine system works, the unique roles of sex hormones, hunger hormones, and stress and energy hormones, and how they interact to affect your body’s systems.

Learn how to optimize hormonal health through diet, with practical advice on nutrients, foods to avoid, and hormone-friendly meal ideas. Understand the science and side effects of artificial and anabolic steroid hormones, including hormone therapy and birth control. You’ll also discover how lifestyle improvements—like exercise, sleep, hydration, and stress reduction—can restore and maintain hormonal balance naturally.

Whether you’re aiming to improve your fitness, support your reproductive health, or simply feel more in control of your wellbeing, this course empowers you with the knowledge and tools to take charge of your hormonal health for life.

This course provides a comprehensive journey into Hormonal Health, covering essential topics that help you understand, manage, and optimize hormonal balance.

Students will explore:

  • Hormonal Health Overview: A holistic approach to understanding the endocrine system and the importance of balance.

  • Types & Functions of Hormones: In-depth insights into cortisol, insulin, thyroid hormones, and more, with a focus on their interrelationship and effects on body functions.

  • Sex Hormones: Detailed exploration of estrogen, testosterone, menstrual cycles, menopause, and andropause.

  • Hunger Hormones: Understanding ghrelin, leptin, and insulin's roles in appetite regulation and weight management.

  • Stress & Energy Hormones: Examining adrenaline, cortisol, and glucagon, and strategies for balancing stress hormones.

  • Optimizing Hormonal Health through Diet: The role of macronutrients, vitamins, minerals, and hormone-friendly foods.

  • Lifestyle Adjustments: The impact of exercise, sleep, hydration, and stress management on hormonal balance.

  • Artificial & Anabolic Steroids: The effects of anabolic steroids, hormone replacement therapy (HRT), and birth control pills on hormonal health.

  • Detecting & Addressing Imbalances: Identifying symptoms, testing, and medical or natural treatments for hormonal issues.

  • Building a Hormone-Healthy Lifestyle: Combining diet, exercise, mental health, and regular check-ups for optimal hormonal balance.
targetAudiences: Individuals aiming to improve their fitness, energy, and hormonal balance naturally
Adults experiencing stress, fatigue, mood swings, or weight challenges

courseDetails.shortDescription: Advance your 2D drafting skills with dynamic blocks, parametric constraints, and productivity tools in AutoCAD.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ready to move beyond the basics? This course is designed for AutoCAD users who want to elevate their 2D drafting efficiency using smarter, faster workflows. Whether you've completed a beginner AutoCAD course or already have fundamental knowledge, this intermediate-level training will show you how to create more intelligent drawings and optimize your design process.

You’ll explore powerful tools like parametric constraints, dynamic blocks, attribute data, and advanced layer management—all essential for professional-level drafting. You’ll also learn how to customize the AutoCAD interface and organize your projects to meet industry standards.

Through hands-on practice files and step-by-step lessons, you’ll gain the skills to draft with precision and confidence. You’ll learn how to automate repetitive tasks, extract data from blocks into tables, and apply annotation tools that adapt across multiple viewports. This course also covers CAD standards, workspace customization, and tips to increase speed and reduce errors.

By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped to take on more complex drafting tasks and collaborate more effectively on CAD projects. Whether you work in architecture, engineering, interior design, or construction, these skills will help you stay competitive and efficient in your field.

Downloadable DWG files, practice exercises, and a final project are included to reinforce your learning.
targetAudiences: This course is for learners who have completed an AutoCAD Essentials course or have fundamental knowledge of AutoCAD. courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, podemos utilizar uno de estos dos plugins: All in One WP Migration o SiteGround Migrator.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.

courseDetails.title: Crea Correos Corporativos con Dominio Propio en Gmail 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a como crear correos corporativos con dominio propio en Gmail, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿CUÁLES SON LAS VENTAJAS DE TENER CORREOS CORPORATIVOS PARA TU NEGOCIO?


Mejor imagen corporativa: Es la primera ventaja que surge de contar con un dominio propio. Le aporta seriedad, confianza y autoridad a tu marca ante tus clientes y proveedores.


De este modo, el dominio te ayuda a mostrar una imagen que refleje compromiso y confianza, y además es una forma de permitir que los usuarios identifiquen fácilmente tu negocio online.


Y es que no genera mucha confianza una empresa cuyo correo electrónico sea una cuenta de Gmail o de Outlook (Hotmail).


Comunicación más efectiva: Muchos emprendedores suelen mezclar las soluciones de comunicación efectivas con las que son de carácter gratuito.


Con esto nos referimos a que elegir una cuenta de correo electrónico gratuito significa quedar atado a ciertas características indeseables. Imaginemos que le enviamos una propuesta interesante a uno de nuestros mejores clientes. Es posible que, ese email termine perdido en la bandeja de Spam, por lo que se aumentan las probabilidades de que nunca sea abierto.


Un gran porcentaje de cuentas gratuitas se utiliza para hacer spam y tus mail pueden ser catalogados de la misma manera si son de cuentas gratuitas. Es un riesgo que no vale nada la pena.


Así pues, contar con un dominio propio hará que tus clientes reciban con seguridad todos tus emails con promociones e información que podría interesarles en su bandeja de entrada principal, por lo que no perderás ninguna oportunidad.


Mejor gestión de información y comunicación: Una de las mejores ventajas de contar con un dominio para los correos electrónicos de tu empresa, es que este te permite crear listas o grupos de trabajo. De este modo, tus colaboradores podrán comunicarse de una manera más sencilla y profesional, al mismo tiempo que aumentan el rendimiento del trabajo en equipo.


Garantiza tu privacidad: sino lo sabías, al crear una cuenta de email en una empresa como Google, debes aceptar obligatoriamente sus políticas de privacidad. Esto significa que Google tendrá acceso a tu información, por lo que esta será usada para mostrarte publicidad personalizada.


En cambio, con un dominio y servidor propio, tendrás la tranquilidad de mantener los datos y la información de tu empresa en buenas manos, pues tu empresa de hosting te garantiza no compartir esta información con terceros. Así, solo tu tendrás control absoluto de tu información.


Mayor seguridad de tus correos: al momento de gestionar una cuenta de correos esto es muy importante. Casi todos los servicios de correos corporativos tienen mayores medidas y protocolos de seguridad ante el posible hackeo o ataque a través de virus por terceros. Existen antivirus, firewalls y filtros anti-spam muy avanzados para proteger tu información confidencial, tus cuentas, dispositivos y equipos.


EN ESTE CURSO, APRENDERÁS:

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo conectar el dominio a tu plan de hosting para comenzar a crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta de correo corporativa con dominio propio.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta de correo electrónico en Gmail.

  • Cómo configurar tu correo corporativo con dominio propio en Gmail.


Crea Correos Corporativos con Dominio Propio en Gmail, es el curso más completo que encontrará en Internet, curso que le mostrará todo lo que necesita saber para crear correos corporativos con dominio propio en Gmail, sin tener conocimientos previos, de forma fácil y simple.

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, utilizando los temas y plantillas que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

courseDetails.title: Unlock Leadership Success with 'Praise and Raise' Method
courseDetails.shortDescription: The innovative educational method "Praise and Raise" draws out employees' talents and fosters growth.
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Praise and Raise" is a proven management method from Japan, already adopted by over 600 companies. In this course, you will learn how to use this practical approach to boost employee motivation, enhance productivity, and create a positive work environment.


The course focuses on two key areas: effective praise and clear communication of expectations. You’ll learn how to praise effort and process, not just results, which encourages a growth mindset and builds self-confidence in your team. Instead of reprimanding employees, you’ll discover how to communicate expectations in a way that motivates improvement and promotes long-term success.


You’ll also learn how to observe and identify your team’s strengths and talents, using the "Praise Sheet (Ho-Me Sheet)" to highlight positive behaviors and foster continuous feedback. This helps create a cycle of ongoing improvement and drives consistent performance. Additionally, you'll explore how to tailor praise to different individuals to ensure it resonates and inspires them to reach new heights, fostering a culture of excellence and engagement.


There’s no special preparation required, so this method can be easily implemented by anyone, regardless of your company’s size or industry. By the end of this course, you'll be ready to unlock your team’s potential and boost overall workplace success.
targetAudiences: For those struggling with team development or preparing to lead a team
